dict.acceptation: 乡下的，农村的；田园的；地方的；农业的；

sent.orig: Urban and rural development and urban-rural integration is an inevitable choice for urban and rural modernization.
sent.trans: 统筹城乡发展，实现城乡一体化是城乡现代化的必然选择。

sent.orig: Rural health service includes rural medical treatment and rural public health service.
sent.trans: 农村卫生服务包括农村医疗和农村公共卫生服务两大部分。

sent.orig: Rural Credit Cooperative (hereafter referred to as rural Credit) is the mainstay of the rural finance.
sent.trans: 农村信用合作社（以下简称农村信用社）是农村金融的主力军。

sent.orig: Rural finance development is to prompt the rural economics growth, main factor that increases farmer income.
sent.trans: 农村金融发展是推动农村经济增长、提高农民收入的重要因素。

sent.orig: Reasonable allocation and utilization of rural land resource are determined by five traits of rural land.
sent.trans: 农地的五个特性决定了人类要合理配置利用农地资源。
